roleset.name: ting
roleset.note: TING-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from ting.01-v)

role.descr: theme, actual thing tinging (intransitive subject, transitive object)

example.name: from Google
example.text: The bell tinged as we approached the long, lonely track up to John Franklyn's house.
example.arg: as we approached the long, lonely track up to John Franklyn's house
